Package com.dua3.utility.text

Class AttributeBasedConverter.AttributeBasedConverterImpl<T>

java.lang.Object
com.dua3.utility.text.AttributeBasedConverter.AttributeBasedConverterImpl<T>
Type Parameters:
T - the conversion target type
Direct Known Subclasses:
AnsiConverter.AnsiConverterImpl
Enclosing class:
AttributeBasedConverter<T>
protected abstract static class AttributeBasedConverter.AttributeBasedConverterImpl<T> extends Object
Abstract base class for the attribute-based converter implementation classes.

    • collectAttributes

      protected static Map<String,@Nullable Object> collectAttributes(Run run)
      Collect all style attributes into a single map.
      Parameters:
      run - the Run
      Returns:
      Map containing all attributes set by this run's styles

    • get

      protected abstract T get()
      Get the converted document once conversion is finished
      Returns:
      converted document

    • apply

      protected abstract void apply(Map<String,Pair<@Nullable Object,@Nullable Object>> changedAttributes)
      Apply new font. Depending on the implementation, using either the font or the changes passed is more convenient and the implementation is free to select whichever is suitable and ignore the other.
      Parameters:
      changedAttributes - map of the changed attribute values

    • setStyle

      protected void setStyle(Run run)
      Update style. There should be no need to override this method in implementations.
      Parameters:
      run - the run for which the style should be updated

    • handleAttributeChanges

      protected void handleAttributeChanges(Map<String,@Nullable Object> newAttributes)
      Handle changes in attributes.
      Parameters:
      newAttributes - map containing the changed attributes and their new values
